title: Thank you Riot for such an amazing skin at a low price. (OS Teemo)
body: This is the nicest skin I've ever seen. Detailed, storyline, lore, so many voice bits, bonus recall animation (I don't like the fact that the helicopter shadow still appears to the enemy if out of range to be seen recalling) and just all around awesome. More skins like this at a higher price than just the 750rp skins (marauder and warden), please.

replies.body:
Hey TornVenom, 

Thanks for the kind words! 

The issue you're referring to with the helicopter is being fixed. :]
Sweet! I really do hope you guys keep up this kinda content, I'll buy RP any day with skins like these.

"Low price" Riot makes a lot of paper selling these pointless skins. 1820 rp for a skin? Really? Thats like 15 bucks!! Thats like buying Counter strike Or watch dogs or some other developed games worth hours of entertainment, except a skin is just a pointless visual for 1 champ out of 150!
